john_doe.name: Creamy Garlic Chicken
john_doe.description: A rich and creamy garlic chicken dish that's easy to make and perfect for dinner.
john_doe.instructions: 1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. 2. Saut√© the garlic in butter. 3. Add cream and simmer until thick. 4. Cook the chicken in the sauce until golden brown.

jane_doe.name: Peanut Butter Brownies
jane_doe.description: Fudgy brownies with a swirl of creamy peanut butter.
jane_doe.instructions: 1. Preheat oven and grease a baking pan. 2. Mix the brownie batter. 3. Swirl peanut butter into the batter. 4. Bake for 25 minutes and let cool.
